channel.title: Health Care on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Health Care on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: AI medical tools found to downplay symptoms of women, ethnic minorities
item.description: Bias-reflecting LLMs lead to inferior medical advice for female, Black, and Asian patients.

item.title: DEXA Scan Deep Dive, With Insights From the Experts (2025)
item.description: DEXA scans measure your bone density, lean muscle, and adipose visceral tissue. But unless you’re an athlete or approaching menopause, you probably don’t need a detailed full-body scan.

item.title: DEXA Scan Deep Dive, With Insights From the Experts (2025)
item.description: DEXA scans measure your bone density, lean muscle, and adipose visceral tissue. But unless you’re an athlete or approaching menopause, you probably don’t need a detailed full-body scan.

item.title: WIRED Health Recap: Cancer Vaccines, CRISPR Breakthroughs, and More
item.description: This year’s WIRED Health summit in Boston featured Moderna CEO Stéphane Bancel, CNN chief medical correspondent Sanjay Gupta, and a day’s worth of insights and provocative conversations.

item.title: WIRED Health Recap: Cancer Vaccines, CRISPR Breakthroughs, and More
item.description: This year’s WIRED Health summit in Boston featured Moderna CEO Stéphane Bancel, CNN chief medical correspondent Sanjay Gupta, and a day’s worth of insights and provocative conversations.

item.title: An Inventor Is Injecting Bleach Into Cancerous Tumors—and Wants to Bring the Treatment to the US
item.description: A Chinese man with no medical training is injecting cancer patients with a toxic bleach solution; a full course of treatment runs $20,000. He’s now working to bring the unproven treatment to the US.
